thread.title: Sales And Marketing Learnership Imm. Start
thread.title_full: Sales And Marketing Learnership Imm. Start

title: Sales And Marketing Learnership Imm. Start
text:
Region : Gauteng / Johannesburg Company : Meondo Trading cc 
VACANCIES SALES EXECUTIVES. learnership imm. start GAUTENG ONLY!!! OWN CAR A MUST!!! EARN UP TO 16K - PLUS Vacancies exist at our Greymont Branch. Liaison with existing and new clients. REQUIREMENTS: - Positive outgoing attitude - Willingness to learn and earn maximum possible - Self Motivated with good self management - Able to work alone and under pressure - OWN CAR AND VALID DRIVING LICENSE ESSENTIAL WE OFFER: Different packages and incentives Full sales and marketing training Bonuses and chance to have own branch within a Year send CV to isabel.meondojobs@hotmail.com
